newsitem.title: USA: MHC extends Chateau tender offer.
newsitem.headline: MHC extends Chateau tender offer.

text.p: Manufactured Home Communities Inc said it Wednesday it will extend its unsolicited tender offer for Chateau Properties Inc to November 6.
The offer had been scheduled to expire Wednesday night.
As of Tuesday afternoon, about 2.7 million shares of Chateau's stock had been tendered to the $26-a-share cash tender offer, Manufactured Home, a manufactured housing community operator, said.
Chateau has 6.1 million shares outstanding. Chateau officials could not be reached for comment.
Including operating partnership units and stock options. Chateau's offer is valued at $398.6 million.

That offer is competing with a proposed merger with ROC Communities Inc, accepted by Chateau's board of directors, that is worth $25.79 a share in stock of the proposed merged company to Chateau shareholders, based on Chateau's stock price Wednesday.
